Hello ! Welcome to my blog. I am The Meridian Sun. Here on this blog you will be able to find my photography work as well as everything I like across the internet world.

A WONDERFUL COMPLEXITY.
  • May 21, 2020
  • Photography
  • 4 comments

A Wonderful Complexity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring wich I enjoy with my whole heart.I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, wich was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquill existence, that I neglect my talents.

TRIPPING OUT - LED BY A DRESSED MONKEY
  • May 19, 2020
  • Videography
  • 1 comment

Filmed on Mars 5, 2020, a mostly first-person chronicle of the day's events leading up to a performance in Wollongong, Australia. Shot on Canon 5D mkII with 50mm 1.2 and 24-70 lenses.

FLYINGPOOL - GOLDMINE
  • May 18, 2020
  • Music
  • No Comments

FlyingPool est un projet dreampopo aux accents parfois shoegaze parfois folk et issu de la collaboration entre Elena Lacroix (chant, guitare, clavier) et Antoine Colen (batterie),deux multi-instrumentistes qui partagent une même passion: créer des mélodies sensibles et envoutantes. Le groupe est accompagné sur scène d'une série de synthétiseurs pour former des nappes atmosphériques et des basses rondes.

A DAY IN THE LIFE
  • May 17, 2020
  • Photography
  • No Comments

He must have tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before.

"Oh, God", he thought, "what a strenuous career it is that I've chosen! Travelling day in and day out.
